attributes.name: identifier
attributes.description: The unique identifier of this radio element. Used for zui-radio-group integration

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Whether or not this radio is checked

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the user from being able to interact with the radio
